**********
Models API
**********

*pyModelChecking* provides implementations for
:ref:`directed graph<graph_api>` and
:ref:`Kripke structures<kripke_api>`.

.. _graph_api:

Graph API
=========

It is used to define :ref:`directed graphs<digraph>` and provides a method
to compute the strogly connected components of a directed graph.

.. automodule:: pyModelChecking.graph
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:

.. _kripke_api:

Kripke API
==========

It is used to define :ref:`Kripke structures<kripke_structure>`.

    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:
